#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
long long int gcd(long long int a,long long int b)
{
    if(b==0)
        return a;
    else
        return gcd(b,a%b);
}
int main(void)
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        long long int n;
        scanf("%lld",&n);
        long long int temp,hcf,b=4;
        if(n==1)
            printf("0/0\n");
        else{
        temp=n*(n-1)/2;
        hcf=gcd(temp,b);
        temp=temp/hcf;
        b=b/hcf;
        printf("%lld/%lld\n",temp,b);
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
